00061 // Renderable Buffer definitions
00062 #define MAIN_BINDING        0
00063 #define DELTA_BINDING       2
00064 #define TEXTURE_BINDING         1
00065 
00066     String PagingLandScapeRenderable::mType = "PagingLandScapeRenderable";
00067 
00068     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00069     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00070     PagingLandScapeRenderable::PagingLandScapeRenderable(PagingLandScapeRenderableManager *renderableMgr) : 
00071         Renderable(), 
00072         MovableObject(),
00073         mParent(renderableMgr),
00074         mCurrVertexes (0),
00075         mCurrIndexes (0),
00076             mInfo (0),
00077             mMaterialLODIndex (0),
00078             mInUse  (false),
00079             mIsLoaded (false),
00080         mDeltaBuffers (0), 
00081         mLastNextLevel (-1), 
00082         mLODMorphFactor (0.0f),
00083         mHeightfield (0),
00084         mMinLevelDistSqr (0),
00085         mRenderLevel (-1),
00086         mIsRectModified (false),
00087         mRect (0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1),
00088         mForcedMaxLod (false)
00089 
00090     {
00091             // No shadow projection
00092         MovableObject::mCastShadows = false;
00093 
00094         // Default query flags to top bit so users can exclude it if they wish
00095         MovableObject::mQueryFlags = SceneManager::WORLD_GEOMETRY_TYPE_MASK;
00096         MovableObject::setRenderQueueGroup(
00097             mParent->getSceneManager()->getPageManager()->getRenderQueueGroupID());
00098 
00099         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00100             mNeighbors[ i ] = 0;
00101 
00102         // Setup render op
00103             mCurrVertexes = new VertexData();
00104             mCurrVertexes->vertexStart = 0;
00105         const unsigned int tileSize = mParent->getOptions ()->TileSize;
00106             mCurrVertexes->vertexCount =  tileSize * tileSize;
00107 
00108             // Vertex declaration
00109             VertexDeclaration* decl = mCurrVertexes->vertexDeclaration;
00110             VertexBufferBinding* bind = mCurrVertexes->vertexBufferBinding;
00111 
00112 
00113         // Vertex buffer #1, position
00114         // positions
00115         size_t offset = 0;
00116         VertexElementType t;
00117         if (mParent->getOptions()->VertexCompression)
00118         {
00119             t = VET_SHORT2;
00120         }
00121         else
00122         {
00123             t = VET_FLOAT3;
00124         }
00125         decl->addElement(MAIN_BINDING, 0, t, VES_POSITION);
00126         offset += VertexElement::getTypeSize (t);
00127         if (mParent->getOptions()->normals)
00128         {
00129             decl->addElement(MAIN_BINDING, offset, VET_FLOAT3, VES_NORMAL);
00130             offset += VertexElement::getTypeSize (VET_FLOAT3);
00131         }
00132         if (mParent->getOptions()->colored)
00133         {
00134             decl->addElement (MAIN_BINDING, offset, VET_COLOUR, VES_DIFFUSE);
00135             offset += VertexElement::getTypeSize (VET_COLOUR);
00136         }
00137 
00138        
00139         HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vbuf = HardwareBufferManager::getSingleton ().createVertexBuffer(
00140                                                     decl->getVertexSize (MAIN_BINDING), 
00141                                                     mCurrVertexes->vertexCount,
00142                                                     HardwareBuffer::HBU_STATIC_WRITE_ONLY);
00143                                                     //HardwareBuffer::HBU_STATIC);
00144 
00145         bind->setBinding(MAIN_BINDING, vbuf);
00146 
00147         if (mParent->getOptions ()->lodMorph)
00148         {
00149             // Create delta buffer for all except the lowest mipmap
00150             assert (mParent->getOptions ()->maxRenderLevel > 1);
00151             const unsigned int maxmip = mParent->getOptions ()->maxRenderLevel - 1;
00152             mDeltaBuffers = new HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr[maxmip];
00153 
00154             // Create additional element for delta
00155            decl->addElement(DELTA_BINDING, 0, VET_SHORT2, VES_BLEND_WEIGHTS);
00156            //decl->addElement(DELTA_BINDING, 0, VET_SHORT1, VES_BLEND_WEIGHTS);
00157 
00158            //decl->addElement(DELTA_BINDING, 0, VET_FLOAT1, VES_BLEND_WEIGHTS);
00159 
00160            //decl->addElement(DELTA_BINDING, 0, VET_SHORT1, VES_TEXTURE_COORDINATES, 1);
00161            //decl->addElement(DELTA_BINDING, 0, VET_SHORT2, VES_TEXTURE_COORDINATES, 1);
00162 
00163             for (unsigned int k = 0; k < maxmip; k++)
00164             {
00165                assert (mDeltaBuffers[k].isNull());
00166                mDeltaBuffers[k]  = createDeltaBuffer(); 
00167             }
00168             // NB binding is not set here, it is set when deriving the LOD 
00169         }
00170             //No need to set the indexData since it is shared from LandScapeIndexBuffer class           
00171         mCustomGpuParameters = Vector4(mParent->getOptions ()->ScaledPageSizeX,
00172                                                                                 mParent->getOptions ()->ScaledHeightY, 
00173                                                                                 mParent->getOptions ()->ScaledPageSizeZ, 
00174                                         mLODMorphFactor);
00175 
00176         mQueued = false;
00177         mParentTile = 0;
00178     }
00179     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00180     PagingLandScapeRenderable::~PagingLandScapeRenderable()
00181     {
00182             delete mCurrVertexes;
00183         delete [] mDeltaBuffers;
00184     }
00185 
00186     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00187     void  PagingLandScapeRenderable::uninit()
00188     {
00189         if (mIsLoaded)
00190             unload ();
00191 
00192         mParentTile = 0;
00193 
00194         mParent->freeRenderable(this);
00195         mInfo = 0;
00196         mHeightfield = 0;
00197         mCurrIndexes = 0;
00198         mLastNextLevel = -1;
00199         mRenderLevel = -1;
00200         mVisible = false;
00201             mInUse = false;
00202         mMaterial.setNull();
00203         mLightListDirty = true;
00204         mQueued = false;
00205         mParentTile = 0;
00206                 mMinLevelDistSqr = 0;
00207     }
00208     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00209     void  PagingLandScapeRenderable::init(PagingLandScapeTileInfo* info)
00210         {
00211                 mMinLevelDistSqr = 0;
00212         mQueued = false;
00213         mParentTile = 0;
00214         mLightListDirty = true;
00215             mInfo = info;
00216             mInUse = true;
00217         mName = StringConverter::toString(mInfo->mPageX) + "." + 
00218                 StringConverter::toString(mInfo->mPageZ) + "." + 
00219                 StringConverter::toString(mInfo->mTileX) + "." + 
00220                 StringConverter::toString(mInfo->mTileZ) + "Rend";
00221 
00222         mForcedMaxLod = false;
00223         mUpperDistance = mParent->getOptions ()->renderable_factor;
00224 
00225                 //we can init texcoord buffer as it's data independent.
00226                 VertexDeclaration   * const decl = mCurrVertexes->vertexDeclaration;
00227                 VertexBufferBinding * const bind = mCurrVertexes->vertexBufferBinding;
00228 
00229                 // make sure buffer isn't binded to another texture coordinate buffer
00230                 if (decl->findElementBySemantic (VES_TEXTURE_COORDINATES, 0) != 0)
00231                 { 
00232                         decl->removeElement(VES_TEXTURE_COORDINATES, 0);
00233                         bind->unsetBinding (TEXTURE_BINDING);
00234                 }
00235 
00236                 // Bind to an existing texture coordinate buffer if it exists
00237                 // or create a new one for this (x,y) combination tile position. 
00238                 //(texture coordinate buffer are shared across buffers)
00239                 const VertexElementType t = VET_FLOAT2;
00240                 //const VertexElementType t = VET_SHORT2;
00241                 decl->addElement(TEXTURE_BINDING, 0, t, VES_TEXTURE_COORDINATES, 0);
00242 
00243                 bind->setBinding(TEXTURE_BINDING, 
00244             mParent->getSceneManager()->getTextureCoordinatesManager()->getBuffer(
00245                         info->mTileX, 
00246                         info->mTileZ));
00247     }
00248     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00249     bool PagingLandScapeRenderable::load()
00250         {
00251                 assert (mQueued || mNeedReload);
00252             assert (mInfo);
00253         if (!mInUse)
00254                 {
00255                         // if not in use, do not load.
00256                         //if (mIsLoaded)
00257                         //      return true;
00258                         //else
00259                         return false;
00260                 }
00261         // case renderable was queued before page was unloaded
00262         // when loaded, page exists no more.
00263         PagingLandScapeData2D *data = mParent->getSceneManager()->getData2DManager()->getData2D(mInfo->mPageX, mInfo->mPageZ);
00264         // Page could be unloaded since renderable queued...
00265         if (data == 0 || !data->isLoaded())
00266             return false;
00267         mHeightfield = data->getHeightData ();
00268         if (mHeightfield == 0)
00269             return false;
00270 
00271         const bool b_lit = mParent->getOptions ()->normals;
00272 
00273         const bool b_coverage = mParent->getOptions ()->coverage_vertex_color;
00274         const bool b_colored = mParent->getOptions ()->colored;
00275 
00276         const Real scale_x = mParent->getOptions ()->scale.x;
00277         const Real scale_z = mParent->getOptions ()->scale.z;
00278 
00279         VertexDeclaration* decl = mCurrVertexes->vertexDeclaration;
00280         VertexBufferBinding* bind = mCurrVertexes->vertexBufferBinding;
00281 
00282         const VertexElement* poselem = decl->findElementBySemantic(VES_POSITION);
00283         const VertexElement* colorelem;
00284         if (b_colored)
00285             colorelem= decl->findElementBySemantic(VES_DIFFUSE);
00286       
00287         const VertexElement* normelem;
00288         if (b_lit)
00289             normelem = decl->findElementBySemantic(VES_NORMAL);
00290 
00291 
00292         // Calculate the offset in the data 
00293         Real min, max;
00294         const unsigned int tileSize = mParent->getOptions ()->TileSize;
00295 
00296         Image::Box oldrect = mRect;
00297         if (!mIsRectModified)
00298         {
00299             mRect.left = 0;
00300             mRect.right = tileSize;
00301             mRect.top = 0;
00302             mRect.bottom = tileSize;
00303 
00304             // Make sure we get a new min and max
00305             min = mParent->getSceneManager()->getData2DManager()->getMaxHeight ();
00306             max = 0.0f;
00307         } 
00308         else 
00309         {            
00310             mRect.right += 1;
00311             mRect.bottom += 1;
00312 
00313             
00314 //            LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(
00315 //                String("PLSM2 : Deformation on tile ") + StringConverter::toString(mInfo->tileX) + ", " + StringConverter::toString(mInfo->tileZ) 
00316 //                +  " : " + StringConverter::toString(mRect.left) + " - " + StringConverter::toString(mRect.right) 
00317 //                +  " | " + StringConverter::toString(mRect.top) + " - " + StringConverter::toString(mRect.bottom),
00318 //                LML_CRITICAL,
00319 //                true);
00320 
00321             // Make sure we get a new min and max
00322             // only if modified heights exceed current bounds 
00323             min = mBounds.getMinimum().y;
00324             max = mBounds.getMaximum().y;
00325         } 
00326         
00327         const unsigned int offSetX = static_cast <unsigned int> (mInfo->mTileX * (tileSize - 1) + mRect.left);
00328             const unsigned int endx = static_cast <unsigned int> (offSetX + (mRect.right - mRect.left));
00329 
00330             const unsigned int offSetZ = static_cast <unsigned int> (mInfo->mTileZ * (tileSize - 1) + mRect.top);
00331         const unsigned int endz = static_cast <unsigned int> (offSetZ + (mRect.bottom - mRect.top));
00332 
00333 
00334         const double inv_scale = 65535.0 / mParent->getOptions ()->scale.y; 
00335 
00336         const unsigned int pageSize = mParent->getOptions ()->PageSize;
00337         const Real * const ogre_restrict mheightField = mHeightfield;
00338         const bool vs = mParent->getOptions()->VertexCompression;
00339 
00340         HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vVertices = bind->getBuffer(MAIN_BINDING);       
00341         const size_t VertexSize = vVertices->getVertexSize ();
00342         const size_t VertexTileSize = VertexSize * tileSize;
00343         uchar* pMain = static_cast<uchar*>(
00344             vVertices->lock(VertexTileSize * mRect.top + mRect.left * VertexSize, // offset
00345                             VertexTileSize *(mRect.bottom - mRect.top) - (tileSize - mRect.right) * VertexSize,//length
00346                             HardwareBuffer::HBL_DISCARD));// buffer mode
00347 
00348         // initial up-down shift and left-right shift
00349         const Real * const heightField = mheightField + offSetZ * pageSize;
00350         unsigned int K_heightFieldPos = 0;
00351         for (unsigned int k = offSetZ; k < endz; k ++)
00352         {
00353             // This allow to reuse the variables in the loop
00354             const Real k_pos = k * scale_z;
00355             uchar *pMainLocal = pMain;
00356                     for (unsigned int i = offSetX; i < endx; i ++)
00357             {
00358                 const Real height =  heightField[ i + K_heightFieldPos ];
00359 
00360                 min = std::min (height, min);  
00361                 max = std::max (height, max);  
00362      
00363                 // vertices are relative to the scene node
00364                 if (vs)
00365                 {
00366                     ushort *pPos;
00367                     poselem->baseVertexPointerToElement(pMainLocal, &pPos);
00368                     *pPos = static_cast<short> ((height * inv_scale) - 32768);          //Y                  
00369                 }
00370                 else
00371                 {
00372                     float *pPos;
00373 
00374                     poselem->baseVertexPointerToElement(pMainLocal, &pPos);
00375 
00376                                 *pPos++ = static_cast <float> (i * scale_x);    //X
00377                                 *pPos++ = static_cast <float> (height);         //Y
00378                                 *pPos   = static_cast <float> (k_pos);      //Z
00379                 }
00380                 
00381             // normals
00382                             if (b_lit)
00383                 {                               
00384                     float *pNorm;
00385                     normelem->baseVertexPointerToElement(pMainLocal, &pNorm);
00386 
00387                     const Vector3 norm = data->getNormal (i, k);
00388                                     *pNorm++ = static_cast <float> (norm.x);
00389                                     *pNorm++ = static_cast <float> (norm.y);
00390                                     *pNorm = static_cast <float> (norm.z);
00391 
00392                             } 
00393                 if (b_colored)
00394                             {
00395                     ColourValue RGBA_precalc;
00396 
00397                     if (b_coverage)
00398                     {
00399                         RGBA_precalc = data->getCoverage (i, k);
00400                         Real a1;
00401                         const Real a2 = 1.0f - RGBA_precalc.a;
00402                         if (a2 != 0.0f)
00403                         {
00404                             a1 = RGBA_precalc.r  /  a2 ;
00405                         }        
00406                         else
00407                             a1 = 0.0f;
00408 
00409 
00410                         RGBA_precalc.r = a1;
00411                         RGBA_precalc.g = a1;
00412                         RGBA_precalc.b = a1;
00413                         RGBA_precalc.a = a2;
00414                     }
00415                     RGBA *pColor;
00416                     colorelem->baseVertexPointerToElement(pMainLocal, &pColor);
00417                     Root::getSingleton().convertColourValue (RGBA_precalc,
00418                                                             pColor);
00419                             }
00420                 pMainLocal += VertexSize;
00421             }
00422             pMain += VertexTileSize;;
00423             K_heightFieldPos += pageSize;
00424             }
00425 
00426             // Unlock the buffers
00427         vVertices->unlock();
00428 
00429             // Calculate the bounding box for this renderable   
00430         if (!mIsRectModified)
00431         {
00432                 mBounds.setExtents(offSetX * scale_x, 
00433                                 min, 
00434                                 offSetZ * scale_z, 
00435                                 endx * scale_x,
00436                                 max, 
00437                                 endz * scale_z);
00438         } // if (!mIsRectModified) 
00439         else
00440         {
00441             const Vector3 maxbound = mBounds.getMaximum();
00442             const Vector3 minbound = mBounds.getMinimum();
00443                 mBounds.setExtents(minbound.x, min, minbound.z, 
00444                                maxbound.x, max,  maxbound.z);
00445         }
00446        
00447 
00448        
00449          
00450         if (mParent->getOptions ()->VisMap)
00451             mParent->getSceneManager()->getHorizon()->registerMinMaxHeightTile (mInfo, min, max);
00452 
00453                 mMinLevelDistSqr = 0;
00454         _calculateMinLevelDist2(mParent->getOptions ()->CFactor);
00455         if (!mIsLoaded)
00456         {
00457             mParent->getSceneManager()->getListenerManager()->fireTileLoaded (mInfo->mPageX, mInfo->mPageZ,
00458                                                                         mInfo->mTileX, mInfo->mTileZ, mParentTile->getWorldBbox ());
00459             mIsLoaded = true;
00460         }
00461         else if (mNeedReload) 
00462         {
00463             mParent->getSceneManager()->getListenerManager()->fireTileDeformed (mInfo->mPageX, mInfo->mPageZ,
00464                                                                         mInfo->mTileX, mInfo->mTileZ, mParentTile->getWorldBbox ());        
00465             mNeedReload = false;               
00466         }
00467         mRect.left = 0;
00468         mRect.right = 0;
00469         mRect.top = 0;
00470         mRect.bottom = 0;
00471                 mIsRectModified = false;
00472                 mVisible = false;
00473                 mChangedRenderLevel = false;
00474                 mIndex = 0;
00475         return true;
00476     }
00477 
00478     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00479     void PagingLandScapeRenderable::unload()
00480     {
00481         assert (mIsLoaded && mInfo);
00482                 assert (!mQueued);
00483         mParent->getSceneManager()->getListenerManager()->fireTileUnloaded (mInfo->mPageX, mInfo->mPageZ,
00484                         mInfo->mTileX, mInfo->mTileZ, mParentTile->getWorldBbox ());
00485         if (mNeighbors[SOUTH])
00486             mNeighbors[SOUTH]->_setNeighbor (NORTH, 0);
00487         if (mNeighbors[NORTH])
00488             mNeighbors[NORTH]->_setNeighbor (SOUTH, 0);
00489         if (mNeighbors[EAST])
00490             mNeighbors[EAST]->_setNeighbor (WEST, 0);
00491         if (mNeighbors[WEST])
00492             mNeighbors[WEST]->_setNeighbor (EAST, 0);
00493         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00494         {
00495             mNeighbors[i] = 0;
00496         }       
00497         assert (mParentNode);
00498         {
00499             SceneNode * const s = static_cast <SceneNode*>(mParentNode);
00500             s->detachObject (mName);
00501             s->needUpdate ();
00502         }
00503         mInUse = false;
00504         mIsLoaded = false;
00505         mInfo = 0;
00506         mLastNextLevel = -1;
00507         mRenderLevel = -1;
00508         mVisible = false;   
00509         mNeedReload = false;    
00510         mRect.left = 0;
00511         mRect.right = 0;
00512         mRect.top = 0;
00513         mRect.bottom = 0;
00514         mIsRectModified = false;  
00515                 mMinLevelDistSqr = 0;
00516     }  
00517     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00518     void PagingLandScapeRenderable::_notifyCurrentCamera(Camera* cam)
00519     {
00520             if (mInUse && mIsLoaded && mVisible)
00521         {     
00522             // if some deformation
00523             if (mNeedReload)
00524             {
00525                 // if between deformation and now, tile have been unloaded
00526                 if (!load ())
00527                 {
00528                     mVisible = false;
00529                     return;
00530                 }
00531             }
00532             // Horizon occlusion. (needs data to be loaded or reloaded)                
00533             if (mParent->getOptions ()->VisMap)
00534             {
00535                 PagingLandScapeCamera* plscam = static_cast<PagingLandScapeCamera*> (cam);
00536                 if(!mParent->getSceneManager()->getHorizon()->IsTileVisible(plscam, mInfo))
00537                 {
00538                     mVisible = false;
00539                     return;
00540                 }
00541                         }
00542                         const int oldRenderLevel = mRenderLevel;
00543             if (mForcedMaxLod)
00544             {
00545                 mRenderLevel = 0;
00546                 mMaterialLODIndex = 0;
00547             }
00548             else
00549                         {                                
00550                                 const Vector3 cpos = cam -> getDerivedPosition();
00551                                 const Vector3 center = getWorldPosition();
00552                                 const AxisAlignedBox& aabb = getWorldBoundingBox(true);
00553                                 Vector3 diff(0, 0, 0);
00554                                 diff.makeFloor(cpos - aabb.getMinimum());
00555                                 diff.makeCeil(cpos - aabb.getMaximum());
00556                                 const Real L = (center - cpos).squaredLength();
00557 
00558                 // Now adjust it by the camera bias
00559                 mDistanceToCam = L * cam->getLodBias ();
00560 
00561                 // Material LOD
00562                 if (!mMaterial.isNull() 
00563                     && mMaterial->getNumLodLevels(MaterialManager::getSingleton()._getActiveSchemeIndex()) > 1
00564                     )
00565                                 {
00566                                         const unsigned short LODIndex = mMaterial->getLodIndexSquaredDepth (L);
00567                                         if (LODIndex != mMaterialLODIndex)
00568                                                 mMaterialLODIndex = LODIndex; 
00569                                 }
00570                 mRenderLevel = -1;
00571                                 const int maxMipmap = static_cast <int> (mParent->getOptions ()->maxRenderLevel);
00572                                 assert (mMinLevelDistSqr);
00573                 for (int i = 0; i < maxMipmap; i++)
00574                 {
00575                     if ((*mMinLevelDistSqr)[ i ] > L)
00576                     {
00577                         mRenderLevel = i - 1;
00578                         break;
00579                     }
00580                 }
00581                 if (mRenderLevel < 0)
00582                     mRenderLevel = maxMipmap - 1;
00583                         
00584                 // Get the next LOD level down
00585                 if (mParent->getOptions ()->lodMorph)
00586                 {
00587                     // Get the next LOD level down
00588                     const int nextLevel = mNextLevelDown[mRenderLevel];                
00589                     if (nextLevel == 0)
00590                     {
00591                         // No next level, so never morph
00592                         mLODMorphFactor = 0.0f;
00593                         mCustomGpuParameters.w = mLODMorphFactor;
00594                     }
00595                     else
00596                     {
00597                         // Set the morph such that the morph happens in the last 0.25 of
00598                         // the distance range
00599                         const Real range = (*mMinLevelDistSqr)[nextLevel] - (*mMinLevelDistSqr)[mRenderLevel];
00600                         if (range)
00601                         {
00602                             const Real percent = (L - (*mMinLevelDistSqr)[mRenderLevel]) / range;
00603                             // scale result so that msLODMorphStart == 0, 1 == 1, clamp to 0 below that
00604                             const Real rescale = 1.0f / (1.0f - mParent->getOptions ()->lodMorphStart);
00605                             mLODMorphFactor = std::max((percent - mParent->getOptions ()->lodMorphStart) * rescale, 
00606                                                                         static_cast<Real>(0.0f));
00607                             mCustomGpuParameters.w = mLODMorphFactor;
00608                             assert (mLODMorphFactor <= 1.0f);
00609                         }
00610                         else
00611                         {
00612                             // Identical ranges
00613                             mLODMorphFactor = 0.0f;
00614                             mCustomGpuParameters.w = mLODMorphFactor;
00615                         }                
00616                     }
00617                     // Bind the correct delta buffer if it has changed
00618                     // nextLevel - 1 since the first entry is for LOD 1 (since LOD 0 never needs it)
00619                     if (mLastNextLevel != nextLevel)
00620                     {   
00621                         assert (mDeltaBuffers);
00622                         
00623                         if (nextLevel > 1)
00624                         {
00625                             mCurrVertexes->vertexBufferBinding->setBinding(DELTA_BINDING, 
00626                                 mDeltaBuffers[nextLevel - 1]);
00627                         }
00628                         else
00629                         {
00630                             // bind dummy (in case bindings checked)
00631                             mCurrVertexes->vertexBufferBinding->setBinding(DELTA_BINDING, 
00632                                 mDeltaBuffers[0]);
00633                         }
00634                     }
00635                     mLastNextLevel = nextLevel;
00636                                 }
00637                         }
00639                         if (oldRenderLevel != mRenderLevel || mCurrIndexes == 0)
00640                         {
00641                                 update ();
00642                                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00643                                 {
00644                                         PagingLandScapeRenderable * const r = mNeighbors[i];
00645                                         if (r && r->isLoaded () && r->isVisible ())
00646                                                 r->update ();
00647                                 }
00648                         }
00649                         mVisible = true;  
00650         }
00651                 else
00652                 {
00653                         mVisible = false;
00654                 }
00655     }
00656     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00657     void PagingLandScapeRenderable::update()
00658         {
00659         mChangedRenderLevel = true;
00660     }
00661     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00662     void PagingLandScapeRenderable::_updateRenderQueue(RenderQueue* queue)
00663     {   
00664        // Notify need to calculate light list when our sending to render queue
00665        mLightListDirty = true;
00666        assert (mInUse &&  mParentNode && mIsLoaded && mVisible);
00667 
00668        if (mChangedRenderLevel)
00669        {
00670            for (unsigned int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00671            {
00672                PagingLandScapeRenderable * const r = mNeighbors[i];
00673                if (r && r->isLoaded () && r->isVisible ())
00674                    r->update ();
00675            }
00676        }
00677        queue->addRenderable(this);        
00678     }
00679     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00680     Technique* PagingLandScapeRenderable::getTechnique(void) const
00681     {
00682             return mMaterial->getBestTechnique (mMaterialLODIndex);
00683     }
00684     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00685     const LightList& PagingLandScapeRenderable::getLights(void) const
00686     {         
00687         if (mLightListDirty)
00688         {
00689             getParentSceneNode()->getCreator()->_populateLightList(
00690                             mCenter, 
00691                             this->getBoundingRadius(), 
00692                             mLightList);
00693             mLightListDirty = false;
00694          }
00695         return mLightList;
00696     }
00697     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00698     Real PagingLandScapeRenderable::getSquaredViewDepth(const Camera* cam) const
00699     {   
00700             // Use squared length to avoid square root
00701             return (PagingLandScapeRenderable::getWorldPosition() - 
00702             cam->getDerivedPosition ()).squaredLength();
00703     }
00704 
00705     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00706     Real PagingLandScapeRenderable::getBoundingRadius(void) const
00707     {
00708             return mWorldBoundingSphere.getRadius();
00709     }
00710     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00711     void PagingLandScapeRenderable::getRenderOperation(RenderOperation& op)
00712     {
00713         assert (mIsLoaded);
00714         assert (mInUse);
00715         assert (mVisible);
00716         assert (mParentNode);
00717 
00718         //setup indexes for vertices and uvs...
00719         op.useIndexes = true;
00720         op.operationType = RenderOperation::OT_TRIANGLE_LIST;
00721         op.vertexData = mCurrVertexes;
00722 
00723         if (mChangedRenderLevel)
00724         {
00725             mIndex = mParent->getSceneManager()->getIndexBufferManager()->getIndexData(mRenderLevel, 
00726                 mNeighbors);
00727             mChangedRenderLevel = false;
00728         }         
00729                 assert (mIndex);
00730                 op.indexData = mIndex;
00731                 mParent->addVisible ();
00732     }
00733     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00734     void PagingLandScapeRenderable::getWorldTransforms(Matrix4* xform) const
00735     {
00736         *xform = mParentNode->_getFullTransform();
00737     }
00738     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00739     const Quaternion& PagingLandScapeRenderable::getWorldOrientation(void) const
00740     {
00741         return mParentNode->_getDerivedOrientation();
00742     }
00743     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00744     const Vector3& PagingLandScapeRenderable::getWorldPosition(void) const
00745     {
00746         return mCenter;
00747     }
00748     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00749     void  PagingLandScapeRenderable::setMaterial(const MaterialPtr &mat)
00750     {
00751         mMaterial = mat;
00752     }
00753     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00754     void PagingLandScapeRenderable::_calculateMinLevelDist2(const Real C)
00755     {
00756                 //level 0 has no delta.
00757            PagingLandScapeOptions * const opt = mParent->getOptions();
00758            const bool lodMorph = opt->lodMorph;
00759 
00760            bool doComputeMinLevelDistSqr = mIsRectModified;
00761        if (mMinLevelDistSqr == 0)
00762            {
00763                    if (mInfo->mMinLevelDistSqr == 0)
00764                    {
00765                            mMinLevelDistSqr = new std::vector<Real>();
00766                            const size_t numLod = mParent->getOptions ()->maxRenderLevel;
00767                            mMinLevelDistSqr->reserve(numLod);
00768                            mMinLevelDistSqr->resize(numLod);
00769                            doComputeMinLevelDistSqr = true;
00770 
00771                            mInfo->mMinLevelDistSqr  = mMinLevelDistSqr;
00772                    }
00773                    else
00774                    {
00775                            // already computed and in cache.
00776                            mMinLevelDistSqr = mInfo->mMinLevelDistSqr;
00777                            fillNextLevelDown();
00778 
00779                            if (!doComputeMinLevelDistSqr)
00780                            {      
00781                                    // no deformation modified
00782                                    // no need to recompute it.
00783                                    if (!lodMorph)
00784                                    {
00785                                            // already computed and in cache.
00786                                            // and no lodMorphing...
00787                                            // so no need to recompute
00788                                            return;
00789                                    }
00790                            }
00791                    }
00792            }
00793            if (doComputeMinLevelDistSqr)
00794                         (*mMinLevelDistSqr)[ 0 ] = 0.0f;
00795 
00796         const double inv_scale = 65535.0 / opt->scale.y; 
00797         //const double scale =  mParent->getOptions ()->scale.y / 65535; 
00798 
00799         const int maxMip = static_cast <int> (opt->maxRenderLevel);
00800         const int tilesize = static_cast <int> (opt->TileSize);
00801 
00802         const unsigned int tileSize = opt->TileSize;
00803 
00804 // should change if we're just refilling a part
00805         if (mIsRectModified)
00806         {
00807             // until we find a way to adjust the modification rect 
00808             // on step size
00809 
00810             // should also refill the vertex map with deformed point 
00811             // (BaseHeight)
00812             mRect.left = 0;
00813             mRect.right = tileSize;
00814             mRect.top = 0;
00815             mRect.bottom = tileSize;
00816 
00817         } // if (mIsRectModified) 
00818 
00819                 const int offSetX = static_cast <int> (mInfo->mTileX * (tileSize - 1) + mRect.left);
00820         const int endx = static_cast <int> (offSetX + static_cast <int> (mRect.right - mRect.left));
00821 
00822             const int offSetZ = static_cast <int> (mInfo->mTileZ * (tileSize - 1) + mRect.top);
00823         const int IntervallModifiedZ = static_cast <int> (mRect.bottom - mRect.top);
00824             const int endz = offSetZ + IntervallModifiedZ;
00825 
00826         const int pageSize = static_cast <int> (opt->PageSize);
00827 
00828 
00829                 const size_t blendWeights = 2;
00830                 //const size_t blendWeights = 1;
00831         assert (IntervallModifiedZ * tilesize > 0);
00832 
00833         // until we found a way to upload part of the data.
00834         assert (IntervallModifiedZ == tilesize);
00835 
00836         const size_t size = blendWeights * IntervallModifiedZ * tilesize;
00837         const size_t buffsize = size * sizeof(ushort); //  sizeof(Real); 
00838 
00839         int K_heightFieldPos;
00840         ushort *BaseHeight = 0;
00841         //Real *BaseHeight = 0;
00842         int i, j;
00843 
00844         const Real * const ogre_restrict heightField = mHeightfield + offSetZ * pageSize;  
00845         if (lodMorph)// &&  mIsRectModified))
00846         {
00847             BaseHeight = new ushort [size];
00848             //BaseHeight = new Real [size];
00849             K_heightFieldPos = 0;
00850             int k = 0;
00851             for (j = offSetZ; j < endz; j ++)
00852             {
00853 // should change if we're just refilling a part to whole tile (only if using discard, tough)
00854                 for (i = offSetX; i < endx; i ++)
00855                 {
00856                     // Save height    
00857                     assert (k < static_cast<int> (size));
00858                     BaseHeight[k] =  static_cast<short> 
00859                             ((heightField[ i + K_heightFieldPos]
00860                                     * inv_scale) - 32768); 
00861 
00862                     //BaseHeight[k] =  static_cast<Real> 
00863                                     //(mheightField[ i + K_heightFieldPos]);
00864                                 
00865 
00866                                                 // should change if we're just refilling a part to whole tile, using a 
00867                                                 //k += tilesize - IntervalleZ;
00868                     k += blendWeights;
00869                     
00870                 }
00871                 // should change if we're just refilling a part to whole tile, using a 
00872                 //k += tilesize - IntervalleX;
00873                 K_heightFieldPos += pageSize;
00874             }
00875         }
00876         //const ushort * const heightField = BaseHeight;
00877         //const Real * const heightField = BaseHeight;
00878 
00879 
00880         Plane t1, t2;
00881         const Real Csqr = C * C;
00882         for (int level = 1; level < maxMip; level++)
00883         {
00884            ushort *pDeltaInit = 0;
00885              //Real *pDeltaInit = 0;
00886             if (BaseHeight)
00887             {
00888                 const size_t lvl_minus_one = level - 1;
00889 
00890                 // Create a set of delta values (store at index - 1 since 0 has none)
00891 
00892 // should change to an interval locking (as in load) ? if we're just refilling a part to whole tile 
00893                 pDeltaInit = static_cast<ushort*> (
00894                     mDeltaBuffers[lvl_minus_one]->lock(HardwareBuffer::HBL_DISCARD));
00895 
00896                 memcpy (pDeltaInit, BaseHeight, buffsize);  
00897                 assert (pDeltaInit);
00898             } // if (BaseHeight)
00899 
00900             ushort * const pDeltas = pDeltaInit;
00901 // should keep previous change in case of partial tile refilling ?
00902 // But how could we lower value ? (if terrain goes smoother)
00903                         if (doComputeMinLevelDistSqr)
00904                                 (*mMinLevelDistSqr)[ level ] = 0.0f;
00905 
00906             const int step = 1 << level;
00907 
00908 // find a way to take a good step end and start 
00909 // even with offset that would make us in "middle of a step"
00910             const int tilesizeMinusstepZ = endz - step;
00911             const int tilesizeMinusstepX = endx - step;
00912             const Real invStep = 1.0f / step;
00913 
00914             K_heightFieldPos = 0;
00915             const int ZShift  = step * pageSize;
00916 
00917             for (j = offSetZ; j < tilesizeMinusstepZ; j += step)
00918             {
00919                 for (i = offSetX; i < tilesizeMinusstepX; i += step)
00920                 {
00921                     {
00922                         const Vector3 v1(i,        heightField[ i +        K_heightFieldPos ],         j);
00923                         const Vector3 v2(i + step, heightField[ i + step + K_heightFieldPos ],         j);
00924                         const Vector3 v3(i,        heightField[ i +        K_heightFieldPos + ZShift], j + step);
00925                         const Vector3 v4(i + step, heightField[ i + step + K_heightFieldPos + ZShift], j + step);
00926 
00927                         t1.redefine(v1, v3, v2);
00928                         t2.redefine(v2, v3, v4);
00929                     }
00930 
00931                     // include the bottommost row of vertices if this is the last row
00932                     const int zubound = (j == (tilesizeMinusstepZ)? step : step - 1);
00933                     for (int z = 0; z <= zubound; z++)
00934                     {
00935                         const int fulldetailz = j + z;
00936                         const Real zpct = z * invStep;
00937                         const bool isFullDetailZ = (fulldetailz % step == 0);
00938                         const int zPageSize = z * pageSize;
00939                         {
00940                             // include the rightmost col of vertices if this is the last col
00941                             const int xubound = (i == (tilesizeMinusstepX)? step : step - 1);
00942                             for (int x = 0; x <= xubound; x++)
00943                             {
00944                                 const int fulldetailx = i + x;
00945 
00946                                 if (isFullDetailZ && 
00947                                     fulldetailx % step == 0)
00948                                 {
00949                                     // Skip, this one is a vertex at this level
00950                                     continue;
00951                                 }
00952                                 const Real xpct = x * invStep;
00953 
00954                                 //interpolated height                           
00955                                 Real interp_h;
00956                                 // Determine which triangle we're on 
00957                                 if (xpct + zpct <= 1.0f)
00958                                 {
00959                                     // Solve for x/z
00960                                     interp_h = 
00961                                         (-(t1.normal.x * fulldetailx)
00962                                         - t1.normal.z * fulldetailz
00963                                         - t1.d) / t1.normal.y;
00964                                 }
00965                                 else
00966                                 {
00967                                     // Second triangle
00968                                     interp_h = 
00969                                         (-(t2.normal.x * fulldetailx)
00970                                         - t2.normal.z * fulldetailz
00971                                         - t2.d) / t2.normal.y;
00972                                 } 
00973 
00974                                 assert  ((fulldetailx + K_heightFieldPos + zPageSize) < (pageSize*pageSize));
00975                                                                 
00976                                                                 const Real actual_h = heightField[ fulldetailx + K_heightFieldPos + zPageSize];
00977                                                             const Real delta = interp_h - actual_h;
00978                                                             if (doComputeMinLevelDistSqr)
00979                                                                 {
00980                                                                         // need to recompute it.
00981                                                                         const Real D2 = delta * delta * Csqr;
00982 
00983                                                                         if ((*mMinLevelDistSqr)[ level ] < D2)
00984                                                                                 (*mMinLevelDistSqr)[ level ] = D2;
00985                                                                 }
00986                                 // Should be save height difference?
00987                                 // Don't morph along edges
00988                                 if (lodMorph)
00989                                 {   
00990                                     // Save height difference                    
00991                                     if (delta != 0.0f)
00992                                     {
00993                                         const int tileposx = fulldetailx - offSetX;
00994                                         const int tileposy = fulldetailz - offSetZ;
00995 
00996                                         if (tileposx != 0  && tileposx != (tilesize - 1) && 
00997                                             tileposy != 0  && tileposy != (tilesize - 1))
00998                                         {         
00999 
01000                                             assert ((tileposx + (tileposy * tilesize))*blendWeights < size);
01001 
01002                                             pDeltas[(tileposx + (tileposy * tilesize))*blendWeights] =  
01003                                                 static_cast<short>                                     
01004                                                 ((interp_h  * inv_scale) - 32768); 
01005                                             //                                        pDeltas[(tileposx + (tileposy * tilesize))*blendWeights] =  
01006                                             //                                            interp_h; 
01007                                         }
01008                                     }
01009                                 }
01010                             }
01011 
01012                         }
01013                     }
01014                 }       
01015                 K_heightFieldPos += pageSize * step;
01016             }
01017 
01018             // Unlock morph deltas if required
01019             if (lodMorph)
01020                 mDeltaBuffers[level - 1]->unlock();
01021         }
01022         // delete Height Data cache and Buffer initial value.
01023         delete[] BaseHeight;
01024 
01025                 if (doComputeMinLevelDistSqr)
01026                 {
01027                         // Post validate the whole set
01028                         for (i = 1; i < maxMip; i++)
01029                         {
01030 
01031                                 // Make sure no LOD transition within the tile
01032                                 // This is especially a problem when using large tiles with flat areas
01033                     
01034                                 /* Hmm, this can look bad on some areas, disable for now
01035                                         Vector3 delta(_vertex(0,0,0), mCenter.y, _vertex(0,0,2));
01036                                         delta = delta - mCenter;
01037                                         Real minDist = delta.squaredLength();
01038                                         mMinLevelDistSqr[ i ] = std::max(mMinLevelDistSqr[ i ], minDist);
01039                                 */
01040 
01041                                 //make sure the levels are increasing...
01042                                 if ((*mMinLevelDistSqr)[ i ] < (*mMinLevelDistSqr)[ i - 1 ])
01043                                         (*mMinLevelDistSqr)[ i ] = (*mMinLevelDistSqr)[ i - 1 ];
01044                         }
01045                         fillNextLevelDown();
01046                 }
01047         }
01048         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01049         void PagingLandScapeRenderable::fillNextLevelDown(void)
01050         {
01051                 // reverse traverse the mMinLevelDistSqr list in order to set
01052                 // the 'next level down'
01053                 Real lastDist = -1;
01054                 int lastIndex = 0;
01055                 const int maxMip = static_cast <int> (mParent->getOptions ()->maxRenderLevel) - 1;
01056                 for (int i = maxMip; i >= 0; --i)
01057                 {
01058                         assert (i >= 0);
01059                         if (i == maxMip )
01060                         {
01061                                 // Last one is always 0
01062                                 lastIndex = i;
01063                                 lastDist = (*mMinLevelDistSqr)[i];
01064                                 mNextLevelDown[i] = 0;
01065                         }
01066                         else
01067                         {
01068                                 mNextLevelDown[i] = lastIndex;
01069                                 if ((*mMinLevelDistSqr)[i] != lastDist)
01070                                 {
01071                                         lastIndex = i;
01072                                         lastDist = (*mMinLevelDistSqr)[i];
01073                                 }
01074                         }
01075                 }
01076         }
01077     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01078     HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr PagingLandScapeRenderable::createDeltaBuffer(void) const
01079     {
01080         // Delta buffer is a 1D Real buffer of height offsets
01081         HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr buf = 
01082             HardwareBufferManager::getSingleton().createVertexBuffer(
01083             VertexElement::getTypeSize(VET_SHORT2), 
01084             //VertexElement::getTypeSize(VET_SHORT1), 
01085             //VertexElement::getTypeSize(VET_FLOAT1), 
01086             mParent->getOptions ()->TileSize * mParent->getOptions ()->TileSize,
01087             HardwareBuffer::HBU_STATIC_WRITE_ONLY);
01088             // HardwareBuffer::HBU_STATIC);
01089 
01090         return buf;
01091 
01092     }
01093     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01094     Real PagingLandScapeRenderable::_vertex(const int x, const int z, const int n) const
01095     {
01096         const unsigned int tilesize = mParent->getOptions ()->TileSize - 1;
01097         switch (n)
01098         {
01099             case 0:
01100                 return ((mInfo->mTileX *  tilesize) + x)* mParent->getOptions ()->scale.x;
01101             case 1:
01102                 return mHeightfield[((mInfo->mTileX * tilesize) +  x) + 
01103                     ((mInfo->mTileZ * tilesize) +  z) * mParent->getOptions ()->PageSize ];
01104             case 2:
01105                 return ((mInfo->mTileZ * tilesize) +  z)* mParent->getOptions ()->scale.z;
01106             default:
01107                 return 0.0f;
01108         }                    
01109    }
01110     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01111     void PagingLandScapeRenderable::_updateCustomGpuParameter(
01112         const GpuProgramParameters::AutoConstantEntry& constantEntry, 
01113         GpuProgramParameters* params) const
01114     {
01115         if (constantEntry.data == MORPH_CUSTOM_PARAM_ID)
01116         {
01117             // Update morph LOD factor
01118             //params->setConstant(constantEntry.index, mLODMorphFactor);
01119             params->setNamedConstant("compressionSettings", mCustomGpuParameters);
01120         }
01121         else
01122         {
01123             Renderable::_updateCustomGpuParameter(constantEntry, params);
01124         }
01125 
01126     }
01127     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01128         void PagingLandScapeRenderable::adjustDeformationRectangle(unsigned int x, unsigned int z)
01129     {        
01130         assert (x < mParent->getOptions ()->TileSize && z < mParent->getOptions ()->TileSize);
01131         if (mIsRectModified)
01132         {
01133             if (mRect.left > x)
01134                 mRect.left = x;
01135             if (mRect.right < x)
01136                 mRect.right = x;
01137 
01138             if (mRect.top > z)
01139                 mRect.top = z;
01140             if (mRect.bottom < z)
01141                 mRect.bottom = z;
01142         }
01143         else
01144         {
01145             // first modification :
01146             // deformation rectangle is the point
01147 
01148             mRect.left = x;
01149             mRect.right = x;
01150             mRect.top = z;
01151             mRect.bottom = z;
01152             mIsRectModified = true;
01153             mNeedReload = true;
01154         }
01155     }
01156                    
01157         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01158         uint32 PagingLandScapeRenderable::getTypeFlags(void) const
01159         {
01160                 // return world flag
01161                 return SceneManager::WORLD_GEOMETRY_TYPE_MASK;
01162         }
01163         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01164         void PagingLandScapeRenderable::_notifyAttached(Node* parent, bool isTagPoint)
01165         {
01166                 MovableObject::_notifyAttached(parent, isTagPoint);
01167                 if (parent)
01168                 {
01169                         assert (mIsLoaded);
01170                         mCenter = mBounds.getCenter()  + mParentNode->getWorldPosition();
01171                         mWorldBoundingSphere.setCenter(mCenter);
01172                         mWorldBoundingSphere.setRadius((mBounds.getMaximum() - mBounds.getMinimum()).length() / 2);
01173                         mParentNode->needUpdate();
01174                 }
01175     }
01176     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01177         Vector3 PagingLandScapeRenderable::_getvertex(const int x, const int z) const
01178         {
01179                 const unsigned int tilesize = mParent->getOptions ()->TileSize - 1;
01180                 const unsigned int pSize = mParent->getOptions ()->PageSize -1;
01181                 Vector3 vertex;
01182                     
01183                 vertex.x = (mInfo->mTileX *  tilesize) + x;
01184                 
01185                 vertex.z = (mInfo->mTileZ * tilesize) + z;
01186 
01187                 vertex.y =  mHeightfield[static_cast<unsigned int>(vertex.x + (vertex.z *mParent->getOptions ()->PageSize) )];
01188                 
01189                 vertex.x += mInfo->mPageX * pSize - mParent->getOptions ()->maxUnScaledX;
01190                 vertex.z += mInfo->mPageZ * pSize - mParent->getOptions ()->maxUnScaledZ;
01191 
01192                 vertex.x *= mParent->getOptions ()->scale.x;
01193                 vertex.z *= mParent->getOptions ()->scale.z;
01194                 return vertex;
01195         } 
01196 
01202         IndexData* PagingLandScapeRenderable::getRawIndexData(const int renderlevel)
01203         {
01204         return mParent->getSceneManager()->getIndexBufferManager()->getRawIndexes( renderlevel);
01205         } 
01206 
01213         void PagingLandScapeRenderable::getRawVertexData(Vector3* pVerts)
01214         {
01215                 // pVerts should be pre-allocated to tilesize*tilesize
01216                 // using getVertexCount()
01217                 const unsigned int tilesize = mParent->getOptions ()->TileSize -1 ;
01218                 
01219                 Vector3 *vert = pVerts;
01220                 Vector3 snPosition = mParent->getOptions ()->position;
01221                 Vector3 tmpVertex;
01222                 
01223                 for (unsigned int i=0; i<=tilesize; ++i)
01224                 {
01225                         for (unsigned int j=0; j<=tilesize; ++j)
01226                         {
01227                                 tmpVertex = _getvertex(j, i);
01228                                 tmpVertex += snPosition; // translate current vertex relatively parent SN position
01229                                 *vert++=  tmpVertex;
01230                         }
01231                 }
01232         } 
01233 
01238         const unsigned int PagingLandScapeRenderable::getVertexCount()
01239         {
01240                 return  mParent->getOptions ()->TileSize * mParent->getOptions ()->TileSize  ;
01241         } 
01242 } //namespace
